TopicTitle: B9 Aerospace ships - how do you finance them in career mode?

Articles.Content:
Hi everybody ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Have been spending a lot of time designing ships with majority B9 aerospace parts in sandbox mode :"> and now continued playing my career mode game. I just realized that the B9 parts are expensive :"> ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

How do you finance your awesome creations in career mode?
They are simply not balanced. I'd use a MM patch to balance them if I played career.

> 
> They are simply not balanced. I'd use a MM patch to balance them if I played career.

Hi sashan, ahhh.. there's a patch to balance it :"> may I ask where can I find it? ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Building a 2-staged mostly B9 parts rocket is going to kill my funding. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Thanks in advance. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> Hi sashan, ahhh.. there's a patch to balance it :"> may I ask where can I find it? ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

> 
> Thanks in advance. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

There is not an existing patch, but you can write one for yourself pretty easily. Look up the module manager syntax or use other config files as a template to adjust the prices of the parts. It will be up to you to decide what is balanced. It is super easy to write such a file, all you need is a word processor like notepad or word pad or notepad++ or something like that.
